# Learning Resources {.sec-resources}

* Full [Git documentation](https://git-scm.com/doc)
* [GitHub documentation](https://docs.github.com/en)
* Professor Matt Blackwell has a great guide for [getting started with R, R Studio, Git, and Github](https://gov51.mattblackwell.org/assignments/00-r-intro/) that we highly recommend if you need additional guidance.
* While geared towards R users, [here](https://happygitwithr.com/) is a guide that also includes very detailed information about Git and GitHub.
